name: Junkyard Dogs Simulator 3D
description:
Do you long for a challenging new game? Do you thrive on expressing that animal instinct?

Junkyard Dogs is here to tap into your potential. Control a dog. Attack other dogs, cats, and humans.

In this game, you navigate an industrial environment. There’s a map to help you. It’s almost like radar. You can hunt down other animals… and even humans. Track the number of victims and your progress.

Of course, there’s all the bells and whistles of a video game. Take advantage of strength and speed upgrades to accomplish even more. Detailed graphics help lay out scenic industrial backdrops.

Key Features:
- Easy to use controls
- Detailed 3D graphics, sounds and ambience
- Dachshund, Doberman, Bulldog, Cat, German Shepherd and other enemies to fight with!

If you have a hungry animal instinct, satisfy it in a virtual world where nobody can say you’re wrong. Junkyard Dogs is just for that inner dog in you!
